<steps> <emailSetConfig .../>
<-- uuencoded message has 2 uuencoded attachments (parts) --> <emailStoreMessageId subject/mailtest.*uu/ propertymid1 messageIndex0/> <emailStorePartCount propertyprop1 messageId#{mid1} /> <verifyProperty nameprop1 text2/>
<-- MIME message has 1 plain body part plus gif and pdf attachment parts --> <emailStoreMessageId subject/mailtest.*mime/ propertymid2 messageIndex0/> <emailStorePartCount propertyprop2 messageId#{mid2} /> <verifyProperty nameprop2 text3/> </steps>
